name: Floralux
description:
As a lonely seed, hope starts to peek out as you find water, soil and sunlight. Starting with nothing, you aspire to be a tall plant one day.

Find sources of water to keep your HP up and spend sunlight to get upgrades like flowers to progress and poison to defend!

Code by Luxiere
3D Art by  Daemon &  Klaiis 
2D Art by Klaiis, Isaac & Raiso
Sound by Will
